segments.text: although with a slight adjustment in his pose where his head is tilted further back in the second shown frame

critique:
1. The mugshot of the man is not positioned on the right side throughout the video but rather in the center of the frame.

2. He is looking slightly to his right, which corresponds to the left side of the frame, not “looking slightly to his left.”

3. Since it is his image being shown, the description “although with a slight adjustment in his pose where his head is tilted further back in the second shown frame” is incorrect — instead, his image is gradually enlarged over the course of the video.
